AltName.entry: CROOKES RIGHTS AND ADVICE CENTRE (FORMER NAME); HILLSBOROUGH & AREA ADVICE SERVICE

Desc.entry: A registered charity that offers advice in the following areas: benefits, debt, employment, housing, consumer rights, etc. Home visits for those unable to get into the centre. Helps with benefit appeals and represents at tribunals and some County Court representation. Company limited by guarantee no 04080466. Self or any referral.

Telephone.entry: Mon, Wed, Fri, and answerphone (please leave a message, an advice worker will ring you back)

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Thurs 9.30am-4.30pm (appointments and home visits only), Tues 10am-1pm (drop-in advice session, arrive before 10am to confirm place)
